Title: Nobody Roots for Goliath
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Daniel Robinson, Morenike Balogun (executive story editor), Abby Ajayi (story editor), Sarah L. Thompson (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
Plot: When Annalise's resolve to certify her class action lawsuit is tested, a surprising ally comes to her aid. Meanwhile, Laurel and Michaela hit a roadblock after someone discovers their plans to take down Laurel's father.
